commit.message:
re PR target/55876 (internal compiler error: in gen_rtx_SUBREG, at emit-rtl.c:776)

2013-01-15  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	PR target/55876
	* optabs.c (widen_operand): Use gen_lowpart instead of gen_rtx_SUBREG.
	Update comment.

From-SVN: r195212

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2013-01-15  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>
+
+	PR target/55876
+	* optabs.c (widen_operand): Use gen_lowpart instead of gen_rtx_SUBREG.
+	Update comment.
